issue.title: [C++] Adding Filter Relation ToProto
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16856](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16856). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Adding `ToProto` functionality for Filter operator in Substrait. The resultant component is re-creating a `filter` operator in ACERO via the received Substrait-relation.
